name: Dragonia Killa
skill: Deals 1691/2071 DMG to enemy target. Target receives 34%/42% more DMG for limited time.

additional_data.description: A spirit that believes she has the strength to kill a dragon. She's always practicing just in case of emergency, memorizing all kinds of different techniques. Currently she's searching for the heir of the "Assassin's Fist" technique. That is to say, she's looking for someone strong enough to be worthy of such a powerful move.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Defeat LVL 40, 50, 60 Yamata-no-Orochi.
◦"Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" Event: Random drops after LVL 40.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦  Increase damage dealt by 20% while battling Yamata-no-Orochi during the "Is this Destiny? -Orochi on the Counterattack-" event.

main: "Stay calm, breathe, and here we go...NOW!"
skill: "If anyone gets in your way just leave them to me!"
